creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: Rinpa-style with white wheels, rock baskets and plovers over waves in gold, simulated pewter and inlaid shell, coral bead ojime. Black pouch.
medium: Lacquer, kinji, gold, silver takamakie, raden inlays
title: (Wide inrō showing plovers in flight above waves, stone basket and water wheel)
